programme.title: Tears and Anthems
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on why the national anthem is more emotive since the 9/11 attack.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke questions why hearing the American national anthem should be uniquely affecting since the attacks on September 11th.
